00020 <
00021   typename Key,
00022   typename Data,
00023   typename HashKey = d3::util::hash<Key>,
00024   typename EqualKey = d3::util::equal<Key>
00025 >
00026 class ext_hash_map
00027 {
00028   // Types
00029 public:
00030 
00031 #if GCC_VERSION < 40300
00032   typedef __gnu_cxx::hash_map<Key,Data,HashKey,EqualKey> internal_hash_map;
00033 #else

00035 #endif

00038   typedef typename internal_hash_map::const_iterator const_iterator;
00039   typedef typename internal_hash_map::size_type size_type;

00043   class const_accessor
00044   {
00045     // Types
00046   public:
00047 
00048     typedef const typename std::pair<const Key, Data> value_type;
00049 
00050     // Attributes
00051   private:
00052 
00053     friend class ext_hash_map;
00054     friend class accessor;
00055     bool has_result_;
00056     const_iterator current_bucket_;
00057     
00058     // Methods
00059   public:
00060     
00061     const_accessor()
00062       :
00063       has_result_(false),
00064       current_bucket_()
00065     {
00066     }
00067 
00068     bool
00069     empty() const
00070     {
00071       return ! has_result_;
00072     }
00073 
00074     const value_type&
00075     operator*() const
00076     {
00077       return *current_bucket_;
00078     }
00079 
00080     const value_type* 
00081     operator->() const
00082     {
00083       return &operator*();
00084     }

00087     release()
00088     {
00089       // nothing to do, because there are no mutexes to release
00090     }
00091 
00092   private:
00093     
00094     // cannot copy or assign a const_accessor
00095     const_accessor(const const_accessor&);
00096     const_accessor& operator=(const const_accessor&);

00098   };

00101   class accessor
00102     :
00103     public const_accessor
00104   {
00105     // Types
00106   public:
00107     typedef typename std::pair<const Key, Data> value_type;
00108     
00109     // Attributes
00110   private:
00111     iterator current_bucket_;
00112     
00113     friend class ext_hash_map;
00114     // Methods
00115   public:
00116     
00117     value_type&
00118     operator*() const
00119     {
00120       return *(this->current_bucket_);
00121     }
00122

00190   bool
00191   find( accessor& result, const Key& key)
00192   {
00193     iterator i =  map_.find(key);
00194     result.current_bucket_ = i;
00195     result.has_result_ = ( i != map_.end() );
00196     return result.has_result_;
00197   }
00198 
00199   bool
00200   find( const_accessor& result, const Key& key) const
00201   {
00202     const_iterator i =  map_.find(key);
00203     result.current_bucket_ = i;
00204     result.has_result_ = ( i != map_.end() );
00205     return result.has_result_;
00206   }
00207 
00208   bool
00209   insert( accessor& result, const Key& key)
00210   {
00211     std::pair<const Key, Data> value_to_insert(key,Data());
00212     std::pair<iterator,bool> p(map_.insert(value_to_insert));
00213     result.current_bucket_ = p.first;
00214     result.has_result_ = true;
00215     return p.second;
00216   }
00217 
00218   bool
00219   erase( const Key& key)
00220   {
00221     return map_.erase(key) > 1 ? false : true; 
00222   }
